Article.ArticleTitle: Special Issue Editorial: Isolation and Analysis of Characteristic Compounds from Herbal and Plant Extracts.

AbstractText: Herbal and plant extracts exhibit various types of properties and activities that have been applied in the medicinal field to treat diseases and achieve better health [...].
